quiz.description: Test your understanding of CIS Controls and implementation groups

questions.question: Which Implementation Group (IG) is most appropriate for a small organization with limited resources?
questions.explanation: IG1 is designed for small organizations with limited resources, providing essential cyber hygiene controls that offer maximum security benefit with minimal resource investment.

questions.question: Which control category focuses on maintaining an up-to-date list of all authorized and unauthorized software?
options: Inventory and Control of Software Assets
questions.explanation: The Inventory and Control of Software Assets category focuses on managing authorized software and preventing unauthorized software from being installed.

questions.question: What is a key characteristic of Organizational Controls (IG3)?
questions.explanation: Organizational Controls (IG3) include advanced capabilities like sophisticated threat detection, suitable for organizations with substantial resources and security expertise.
